name: Super Mario Bros: Creature from the Mushroom Kingdom
name_original: Super Mario Bros: Creature from the Mushroom Kingdom
description:
WOW! This is my own new game that's called Super Mario Bros Creature from the Mushroom Kingdom.

It's made with Hello Mario Engine 3, 4, Ultramario Engine, FDEngine Exi Source and Hypernova's Mario Engine.

It's based on SpongeBob SquarePants Creature from the Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob Movie GBA and Super Princess Peach.

It's Powered by Luigi Forever 2.
